column4: Can anyone help me with this? https://help.ubuntu.com/community/Java Im dumb! xD i don't understand most of it
what version if Ubuntu?
ummm 8.04 or somethinggg oh wait maybe 9.04 ah idk xD how do i check
generally, sudo apt-get updatee && sudo apt-get ubuntu-restrcited-extras will get java (and other things) goinf for you
neither of them worked
what happened?
sudo apt-get update && sudo apt-get install ubuntu-restricted-extras
okay is doing it now
woah this is doing alot xD
wud i have to restart laptop to use java?
no, just firefox
okay thanksss
in the terminal type java -version   do you get anything back?
it didn't work tho :o
no, you appear to have the opensource java installed
umm know what to do now? xD
yeah you need to sun java packages not the opensource ones
how do i get them? :o
i typed into konsole aptitude search sunjava and sun java 6 or something came up, shud i get that?
sudo apt-get install sun-java6-jre && sudo apt-get install sun-java6-plugin
okay* :P
how do i accept the lisence?
tab the "ok"
